xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/653975-Becoming Julia 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/qOozf9jkAIi3RloWCphzXEZxcBl.jpg In this intimate and personal portrait, we follow Paul, a single, straight bus driver of 37, as he undergoes a gender transition to begin living as a woman called Julia. Filmed over a two year period, this documentary explores the stereotypes about what makes a man and what makes a woman. Becoming Julia
